title: The Best Rain Barrels of 2024
summary: The article discusses rain barrels as a means to conserve and store water for non-rainy days, with tips on purchasing, reviews of best barrels, and maintenance. It covers capacity, materials, features, and regulatory considerations for rainwater collection.

green_process: FALSE; The article focuses on the use and maintenance of rain barrels as a product, rather than detailing new methods or techniques in manufacturing or production to minimize environmental impacts.

title: Veolia Water Technologies to expand in Wuxi, China with new intelligent factory
summary: Veolia Water Technologies & Solutions expands its operations in Wuxi, China through an agreement with the Administrative Committee of Wuxi National High-Tech Industrial Development Zone to introduce new products for energy-saving and environmentally friendly clean production lines under the GreenUp program.
green_innovation: TRUE. This initiative by Veolia Water Technologies & Solutions to expand and introduce environmentally friendly products aligns with the goals of green innovation by focusing on decarbonization, energy-saving, clean production, pollution prevention, and sustainable resource management.
business_innovation: TRUE. Veolia Water Technologies & Solutions' expansion and introduction of new products in Wuxi, China, signify a significant change in the company's operations and product offerings, meeting the criteria of business innovation.
green_product: TRUE. The article mentions Veolia's plan to introduce new products that aim for energy-saving and environmentally friendly clean production lines, emphasizing the design, manufacturing, and use of goods with reduced environmental impact, which qualifies as green product innovation.
green_process: TRUE. The article discusses Veolia's focus on building energy-saving and environmentally friendly clean production lines, which involves methods and techniques that aim to minimize environmental impacts and promote sustainability, meeting the definition of green process innovation.

greenwashing: FALSE. The article does not indicate any false or misleading environmental claims by Veolia Water Technologies & Solutions, making it an authentic example of green innovation.

title: How Google is supporting the circular economy
summary: The article discusses Google's efforts in adopting circularity strategies to achieve a zero-waste goal, reducing the environmental impact of its data centers, campuses, and products. It emphasizes the concept of a circular economy to minimize waste, promote reuse of materials, and mitigate climate change through innovative design and sustainable practices.
green_innovation: TRUE. The article focuses on Google's adoption of circularity strategies and efforts towards a zero-waste goal, aligning with environmental sustainability goals and contributing to reducing the environmental impact of their operations.
business_innovation: FALSE. While the article discusses business processes and product developments, the primary focus is on environmental sustainability and circular economy practices, rather than traditional business innovations.
green_product: TRUE. The article highlights Google's commitment to using sustainable materials, designing products for circularity, and promoting safe and healthy materials in its product development, aligning with the definition of a green product.
green_process: TRUE. The article emphasizes Google's implementation of green processes in its operations, such as repairing and refurbishing components to extend product life, promoting waste diversion and recycling in data centers and campuses, and ensuring the reuse of materials.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 518210 - Data Processing, Hosting, and Related Services, 541512 - Computer Systems Design Services, 484210 - Used Household and Office Goods Moving, 423930 - Recyclable Material Merchant Wholesalers
greenwashing: FALSE. The article does not fall under greenwashing, as it highlights Google's genuine efforts towards sustainable practices and circular economy principles, avoiding false or misleading environmental claims.

title: Wonder Juice™ Recognized With “Juice Product of the Year” In 2024 Mindful Awards Program
